languages.text: "Не все твои лакеи хорошо выдрессированы, {name}. Стоило мне переступить порог этой убогой норы, как пришлось взяться за оружие".
"Not all your lackeys are well trained, {name}. As soon as I crossed the threshold of this squalid hole, I was forced to take up arms."
languages.original_text: "Не все твои лакеи хорошо выдрессированы, {name}. Стоило мне переступить порог этой убогой норы, как пришлось взяться за оружие".

traits.locale_text: "Not all your lackeys are well trained, {name}. As soon as I crossed the threshold of this squalid hole, I was forced to take up arms."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Not all your lackeys are well trained, {name}. As soon as I crossed the threshold of this squalid hole, I was forced to take up arms."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Not all your lackeys are well trained, {name}. As soon as I crossed the threshold of this squalid hole, I was forced to take up arms."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Not all your lackeys are well trained, {name}. As soon as I crossed the threshold of this squalid hole, I was forced to take up arms."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “你手下有些喽啰缺乏教养，{name}。我一踏入这个肮脏的洞穴，就不得不举起武器自卫。”
languages.original_text: "Not all your lackeys are well trained, {name}. As soon as I crossed the threshold of this squalid hole, I was forced to take up arms."

traits.locale_text: “你手下有些喽啰缺乏教养，{name}。我一踏入这个肮脏的洞穴，就不得不举起武器自卫。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «No todos tus lacayos están bien adiestrados, {name}. En cuanto atravesé el umbral de este miserable cuchitril, me vi obligado a tomar las armas».
languages.original_text: "Not all your lackeys are well trained, {name}. As soon as I crossed the threshold of this squalid hole, I was forced to take up arms."

traits.locale_text: «No todos tus lacayos están bien adiestrados, {name}. En cuanto atravesé el umbral de este miserable cuchitril, me vi obligado a tomar las armas».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Le dressage de certains de vos laquais laisse à désirer, {name} À peine avais-je franchi la porte de ce taudis que j'ai été contraint de dégainer mes armes. »
languages.original_text: "Not all your lackeys are well trained, {name}. As soon as I crossed the threshold of this squalid hole, I was forced to take up arms."

traits.locale_text: « Le dressage de certains de vos laquais laisse à désirer, {name} À peine avais-je franchi la porte de ce taudis que j'ai été contraint de dégainer mes armes. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Nicht alle Eurer Lakaien sind gut ausgebildet, {name}. Als ich in dieses armselige Loch hinabgestiegen bin, war ich sofort gezwungen, zu den Waffen zu greifen."
languages.original_text: "Not all your lackeys are well trained, {name}. As soon as I crossed the threshold of this squalid hole, I was forced to take up arms."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht alle Eurer Lakaien sind gut ausgebildet, {name}. Als ich in dieses armselige Loch hinabgestiegen bin, war ich sofort gezwungen, zu den Waffen zu greifen."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「お前の部下が全員きっちり訓練されてるってわけじゃあないみたいだな、{name}。この汚い穴蔵の敷居をまたいだ瞬間、俺は武器をとらざるを得なかったんだ」
languages.original_text: "Not all your lackeys are well trained, {name}. As soon as I crossed the threshold of this squalid hole, I was forced to take up arms."

traits.locale_text: 「お前の部下が全員きっちり訓練されてるってわけじゃあないみたいだな、{name}。この汚い穴蔵の敷居をまたいだ瞬間、俺は武器をとらざるを得なかったんだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Dalkavuklarının hepsi çok iyi eğitim almamış {name}. Şu sefil deliğin sınırını geçtiğim gibi silahlarımı kuşanmak zorunda kaldım."
languages.original_text: "Not all your lackeys are well trained, {name}. As soon as I crossed the threshold of this squalid hole, I was forced to take up arms."

traits.locale_text: "Senin dalkavukların hepsi çok iyi eğitim almamış {name}. Şu sefil deliğin sınırını geçtiğim gibi silahlarımı kuşanmak zorunda kaldım."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
